name: Comfort Inn Monterey Peninsula Airport

reviews.text: I booked a room here because it was highly rated on Tripadvisor and they had one available for a busy holiday weekend, with no minimum stay requirement. The rate was almost $200 per night, probably due to the weekend.
reviews.title: Quiet and Large Room for Memorial Weekend Stay

likes.liked: — Room size, Huge TV, Free wireless internet, quiet location
likes.disliked: — Room decor and bathrooms need updating

reviews.text: The buildings are quite old, which isn't really obvious until you look at some of the original fixtures of the rooms and bathrooms. Overall, the property has really been maintained over the years, so it looks newer. Our room had a fireplace, small kitchen nook and a huge wall-mounted Vizio TV. This has to be the largest screen TV I have ever seen in a hotel room, and they had cable with a large assortment of channels available.
reviews.title: quiet familt resort
Quiet Clean hotel
reviews.text: The bed was comfortable and the room was extremely quiet for sleeping at night. The size of the room was so large, it has the feel of a studio apartment more than a motel room. The bathroom was equally large, with two separate areas, and also made it feel more like an apartment than a motel.

The unimpressive part of the room was the old brown ceramic tile dominating the bathroom, and the shower fixture was very low in height with slightly weak water pressure. The decor of the room was similarly dated, but at the same time, well maintained over the years.
reviews.title: Really nice for the price

reviews.text: I am a little surprised this is the number 2 rated property in Monterey, CA. It was a comfortable and large room, but for the price, I would have expected the room furnishings and bathroom (tile and fixtures) to have been updated more recently.
reviews.title: Great Hotel! Oldie but Goodie...

reviews.text: Hotel was nice and rooms large, but there is no AC. It was 90+ outside and all the hotel would do is give us a fan to push the hot air around. When I compained the hotel said sorry we don't control mother nature and offered us nothing. So much for quest service.
reviews.title: No AC, no customer service

reviews.text: The corp office of comfort inn did finally step up and compensate us for some of our stay, but this privately run/owned property did nothing.
reviews.title: Great Price, Old Place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was a great value considering the surroundings. It is a little drive from downtown Monterey. The rooms were very spacious but outdated. The brown tile in the bathrooms and mint green curtains brought me back to the 80's. We were on the bottom floor and stayed awake most of the night because the people above us kept stomping around (thin floors, haha). The door had to be pulled shut, which I suppose is better than those hotels were the door slams shut waking everyone up. Breakfast was nice: basic continental, but they had a waffle iron that you get to use to make your own waffles (that was fun!!!).
reviews.title: Nice, but dated

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: A surprising gem!

likes.liked: — Clean and quiet, Friendly hotel staff, Beautiful grounds.

reviews.text: Ok for a couple of nights stay. Small comfortable family run motel. Rooms clean, but could do with a bit of a face lift.
reviews.title: Nice Surprise
Excellent hotel more than two stars
reviews.text: It is now comfort inn monterey airport. It is excellent hotel to stay and should be a three star hotel. Room size is big compared to general hotel/inn. There is a cooler and microwave but we don't have a chance to use it. Bath room is newly renovated. Wireless connection is free so I can write you a review now. We will try out the breakfast tomorrow.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had stayed at other three star hotels (famous chain). This comfort inn is definitely much better.
reviews.title: Ideal Way Station

reviews.text: I will stay here next time when come down to Monterey.
reviews.title: Best Bargain in Monterey

aka: Comfort Inn Monterey Peninsula Airport Hotel Monterey
description: Welcome to the Comfort Inn Monterey Airport. We are located on sprawling tree covered grounds at the entrance to the scenic Monterey California Peninsula. We are just minutes away from Cannery Row, Monterey Bay Aquarium, shopping, dinning and many sporting activities. We offer a free continental breakfast. All hotel rooms have free wireless high speed Internet access, microwaves, refrigerators, iron and ironing boards. Some of our hotel rooms offer balconies or bay windows, and fireplaces.
